channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Bixby Routines
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Bixby Routines

item.title: CVE-2022-22286|2024-08-03T03:07:50.229Z -- samsung%20mobile -- bixby%20routines
item.description: A vulnerability using PendingIntent in Bixby Routines prior to version 3.1.21.8 in Android R(11.0) and 2.6.30.5 in Android Q(10.0) allows attackers to execute privileged action by hijacking and modifying the intent.
